name: Hide and Seek
about: Hide and seek is a fun filled and interesting game where a riddle or situtation is given to the participant and answer related items will be stored in the mud pit. The participant must guess the item with in given time.

name: Brain Strom
about: Get ready to feel the deJa vu of your kindergarten, let's see how well you know your alphabets and make sure your toys are not clumsy

name: Anaganaga
about: We as part of this event organise poetry recitation, story telling and stand up comedy

name: The Ultimate Avengers Quiz
about: There are many marvel fans in our college and 2018 was a big year for all the marvel fans. Everyone is enthusiastic about the final move. We are refreshing all the memories from 2008 till tody by conducting a fun contest on all MCU movies
